title: THE SACRED WOOD
description: When Jane Harrison, an English woman living in contemporary Rome, hears a dying man’s whispered plea she is drawn into a quest that will lead her to the legend-haunted shores of Lake Nemi, where an ancient battle between good and evil will determine humanity’s future. Beneath a deceptively traditional surface, the novel shows a disturbing and often shocking world where good might not always triumph.
author: Joanna Leyland
